TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you get a circulizer that circulates better.

I wish for my good pen.

Granted. This is your best one.

I wish for curium-245.

Granted: You find that it has actually been in your lab coat pocket for a year.

I wish for a lead lab coat.

Granted. Now you need a crane to lift it.

I wish for a beryllium carbide hohlraum.

Granted. Your beryllium carbide hohlraum is now in a dihydrogen monoxide weltraumbaum.

I wish I could have the aforementioned crane.

Granted: I am building it but it isn't finished yet.

I wish it was finished.

Granted. It was. But now you have to re-finish it again.

Why was the Prometheus ship carrying a whole fridge of frozen ravioli?

Granted: you now know.

I wish I knew the right answer to everything.

Granted. You do. But nobody believes.

I wish my school had a little nuclear reactor back in my day.

Granted: It was called chernobyl.

I wish for money.

Granted, you get 1000000 rupees 

I wish for more friends who play ksp.

Granted. But as KSP is single-player, they just eat your pizza while you are playing.

I wish for a castle for horrififc scientific experiments.

Granted: You are that brain in a jar up on the top shelf.

I wish for stuff I can't have.

Granted. You can't have a indesructible house. Now get in and lock it up.

I wish I can have moar mods

Granted, you can only use mods with MOAR in the title

 

I wish for Big G to be real

Edited September 24, 2022 by Rutabaga22

Granted. Apollo program had been cancelled, no Moon flights.

I wish there were not only Gemini, but also Gemidi and Gemaxi.

Granted, but they are for launching pickles only.

i wish to know what the fox says.

195709282022

Granted:

One night farmer Brown was takin' the air
Locked up the barnyard with the greatest of care
Down in the hen house, somethin' stirred
When he shouted, "Who's there?"
This is what he heard

There ain't nobody here but us chickens
There ain't nobody here at all
So calm yourself, and stop that fuss
There ain't nobody here but us
We chickens tryin' to sleep, and you butt in
And hobble hobble hobble hobble with your chin
There ain't nobody here but us chickens
There ain't nobody here at all
You're stompin' around and shakin' the ground
You're kickin' up an awful dust
We chickens tryin' to sleep and you butt in
And hobble, hobble hobble hobble, it's a sin

Tomorrow is a busy day
We got things to do, we got eggs to lay
We got ground to dig and worms to scratch
It takes a lot of settin', gettin' chicks to hatch

Ohh, there ain't nobody here but us chickens
There ain't nobody here at all
So quiet yourself, and stop that fuss
There ain't nobody here but us
Kindly point that gun the other way
And hobble, hobble hobble off and hit the hay

[Instrumental Break]

Tomorrow is a busy day
We got things to do, we got eggs to lay
We got ground to dig and worms to scratch
It takes a lot of settin', gettin' chicks to hatch

I wish to know what the Musk says.

He says:
Starships that exploded were not failures, they were features.

I wish to have a better KSP.

Granted. Microsoft updated the Keyword Services Platform.

I want a ROSS station mod.

Granted: You get the one where Ross and Rachel were on a break.

I wish to earn money doing what I like.

Granted. You are earning money for liking the money earning.

Spoiler

The problem is the original earning when you hadn't earned anything.

 

I wish for guns in Skyrim and for magic in Fallout.

Granted. Skyrim become Fallout and Fallout become Skyrim. 

I wish I can use NTR in real life

Granted: You can use n,t,r and all the other letters of the alphabet in real life.

I wish I understood letters with little symbols over them.

Granted. Now you understand that they mean nothing, and were added by the type equipment manufacturers.

As there were centurions, were there dollarurions or pennurions?
